resources.string: Turisteando2 We have many parts where you, your family and friends can rest and enjoy, we have cabins from $280,000 a night and rooms from $85,000 a night
In this restaurant we will find all kinds of food, from typical food to fast food with varied prices with lunch from $14,000 the cheapest, even the cheapest salchipapa from $4,000

We also have many areas where you can go out to recreate with your family and a bunch of friends. We have different activities such as aquatic areas from $14,000 for the entrance We also have horseback riding from $20,000 an hour, we have different activities and what to know about our paths guarneñas
